column4: Hello. I have just finished upgrading Ubuntu 10.10 to 11.04 via the updater. After the reboot Ubuntu hangs on  logo. I tried restarting the VM, and the same happens. Hang on Ubuntu logo
I am not a linux noob, I just need a good pointer in which direction to go now, what to troubleshoot first, and how

on the grub2 screen (hold shift if you don't see it) use "e" to edit the boot line - and try removing "quite splash" and/or try "nomodeset" - then i think ctrl+x to boot (but not 100% sure on that, it says what to use to boot)
will try now. bazhang  because i'm trying to see how reliable is updating via updater :)
